additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Aluminium Chlorohydrate, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Steareth 2, Steareth 21, Fragrance, EDTA, Butylated Hydroxytoluene (BHT), Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Citronellol, Limonene, Amyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Coumarin, Benzyl Alcohol

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Keep out of reach of children.

description: Brut Original Roll On is iconic, Australian made and owned. Featuring Brut's Original fragrance which unites citrus, fougere and musky elements to create a fresh and clean scent for men. All whilst providing Long last 24Hr Antiperspirant protection.
name: Original Roll On Deodorant
